iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Pakistan
iati-activity.description: ROZAN will implement a Project called "Aangan - To reduce stigma around the issue of child sexual abuse by advocating, building capacity and raising awareness among individuals, professionals, institutions and organizations". The Aangan resource center aims to advocate more efficiently and effectively towards the formation of child protection and safety mechanisms and provide information to individuals regarding safe childhood, not only as a means of preventing children from child sexual abuse but also giving them an environment that ensures safety and enhances self-confidence. It also plans to build research as a necessary component, which would serve as a tool for advocating on the issues Aangan has been struggling with at either attitudinal level of individuals towards the issue or in bringing about a prominent and promising change in the child protection system.
